thread.title: Jewish Couple in Critical Condition After Being Hit By Car in Borough Park
thread.title_full: Jewish Couple in Critical Condition After Being Hit By Car in Borough Park

author: Mark Hirshberg
title: Jewish Couple in Critical Condition After Being Hit By Car in Borough Park
text:
Share 
A elderly Jewish couple is in critical condition after being struck by a vehicle a short while ago in the borough park section of Brooklyn. 
The couple who is 62-years-old were crossing at the intersection of new Utrecht ave and 51 street shortly after 11:00pm, and where struck by a mini van who made a left turn from 51 street onto new Utrecht avenue cops said. 
Hatzlaoh responded to the scene and after treating them at the scene transferred them to Lutheran medical center where the Husband is being treated for serious head injuries and his wife is being treated for leg injuries. 
NYPD 66 precinct and Highway Collision investigation Squad are on the scene conducting an investigation. 
The 50-year-old Driver of the Mini Van Stayed on Scene police said.
